title: Opus Dei in the Philippines, Jordan Peterson and the Reconciliation of Heaven and Earth
description:
Carlos shares how his life changed through Opus Dei, how he found Jordan Peterson and what grabbed him about my videos. 

Notes from the talk
Philippines at 5am
Assumed value of money making
Career most important thing? No
University where everyonoe worships darwin and marx
Glad to not see the face of a priest ever
Didn’t declare atheist, just didn’t care
Evangelical friends
Guest pastor from the us
Sermon was about love of christ, passion narratives, suffering, gory
When will you have communion? 
Started going research on Christianity, 
Taken aback by uu take on RC eucharist
Read RC apologetics, church fathers…
RC and Orthodox are closer to historical beliefs…
Noontime daily mass, 2 churches in the godless university
Eucharistic miracles
I might start believing this if I saw a eucharistic miracle
Opus dei
Pray to the saint, I need your help to know if Jesus is in the box
“I need him” 
How to go to confession
From opus dei to jordan peterson
Suspender video, had himself together, integrated person
First thing: 3 hail Mary, get up every morning at the same time
Make a schedule in opus dei
Daily office, 
Your schedule should fit your hand like a glove
Your schedule should be your friend
Others in opus dei listen to JBP
Because you’re a divine son of god
Remember you’re a son of god, you should act like it
More of christ, less of you
Prayer of absolution
Filipino to Opus Dei to JBP to reconciliation of heaven and earth
Benedict option
Wealthy successful and miserable
The successful people who are happy failed in some way
The case of jpb is straightforward. All the gifts but faith has been withheld
